page.title: 13RELIGION - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: North Tawton has 4 main centres of worship. {1.The Parish Church}of St.Peter. Incumbent:Reverend Bertram Bailey who is Rector of North Tawton with Bondleigh. Family Services are held once a month when the congregation numbers approx. 100. {2.The United Reformed Church}formerly the Congregational Church.There is no resident minister. {3.The Methodist Church.}There is no resident minister. {4.The Gospel Hall}- A place of worship for{Plymouth Brethren The nearest{Roman Catholic}church and {Baptist}church are in Okehampton.
